reviewText: Leisa Hart has done it again...this is a great set of videos, Chisel and Burn, and they are so good at getting the heart rate up and moving around to great tunes. My body is in great shape after having a baby 4 months ago and Hart's new videos are to praise for it. I love this and think you will too.
summary: CoreBar is great to use, better than a body bar, fun

reviewText: Leisa Hart is a very fit trainer, and her style of strenght training the Core muscles is very effectively toning my arms and abs and back and I feel as strong as I did 15 years ago in college when i trained daily. This is a great video you can do with any kind of free weights or dummbells or a body bar or her Core Bar(which is the best one and is sold at her site). I love Leisa Hart;s teaching style and highly recommend this and the Chisel video, as well as her other new video Gym In A Box,they are all great workouts.
summary: you have to strenght train, and this is the way to do it

reviewText: I Love This Video! I did a simialr review for the CHISEL video, which I think you need to get also. Leisa Hart is my role model in fitness, she looks so great for having two small babies. I adore her style of isntruction, she is so motivating. FitToTheCore Chisel is a great strenght training video and BURN is so good with the additional cardio, my heart rate gets up and I sweat off so serious sweat; this video combines elements of core training with Leisa's wighted bar is so unique and effective. I alternate using hand wieghts one day and her bar the next time, and it is great. I see the result, my hubbie is seeing the results when I undress, he claims my body is more fit than ever, and I agree, and it's because of the way i feel doing Leisa Hart's videos. THANKS LEISA!
summary: great cardio BURN, mixed in with great strenght moves

I loved it.

I used my body bar, but you can do free weights in this and still do great, you can actually use anything with a bit of resistnace. I have preorded Leisa's CORE BAR and can't wait to gt it. Title: N/A

reviewText: I copied my review that i just wrote for the Chisel FitToTheCore video, they are both wonderful fitness videos and must have to any fitness regime. i ususally don't write reviews for fitness videos, because they seldom are used by me and my daughter only a few times, but i have simply fallen in love with this strenght training video. My daughter had a baby and used a FitMama Postnatal video starring Leisa Hart, and so we both decided to try her FitToTheCore videos and have really loved the results we have gotten, combining strenght training and cardio. Hart is energetic and positive, and the muscle tone we both now have is due to the fact that Hart keeps us going, she isn't a bully type of coach or an over the top idiot like denise austin or richard simmons, she is very genuine and straight forward. My daughter and I both used dumbbells, and then we got Hart's Core Bar from her website and absolutely loved it. You can change the weight by adding another end piece, so it's very good to have that instant adjustability. If you own a body bar, thats fine, but you would have to own several of them to get the variations. TO sum it up, Leisa Hart's videos are professionally done and wonderfully easy to follow. I suggest you get both the Burn and the Chisel videos, or anything that this woman stars in...we are now lean and mean fans of Leisa Hart, and look forward to her future new videos.
summary: fantastic workout, great, great ,great strenght training

reviewText: i have to admit i am new to home videos for exercise, but i love this unique cardio style of workout...Leisa Hart is a great instructor and makes me feel like i can accomplish this routine and get my body into shape, and i have done that with the CORE BAR and her other videos, aka, Gym In A Box....she has great videos and is a competent,strong and sexy looking role model(and a new mom like me, i just wish i could be that fit!!!)...you have to try the CHISEL Fit TO The Core video and teh Gym In A Box, they are WELL WORTH IT, oh, and get her Core Bar, it is the best wieght tool i have ever seen, nothing else compares, my hand weights, my Body Bar, nothing is as good and convenient....Good luck!
summary: great arm toning, cardio is unique yet easy to learn
Title: N/A

reviewText: This workout is pretty good,  but you don't really need the Core Bar--since 90% of people doing the workout are at home, you can use a chair, or sofa, or doorway for the stretching portions where the Core Bar is used as just a support, or even a cane or walking stick, for that matter.And yes, you can use dumbbells, or another body bar (the big difference with hers seems to be that it's padded, which is nice but not essential, and that you can adjust the weights and use the ends as very light handweights). Her bar only goes up to 12 pounds, which could be an issue for when you want to ramp up your workout a bit. If using dumbbells, you might want to get some with straps that go across the back of the hand.I rented this, and in the chapter breakdown, it shows a picture of them exercising on the floor. There is no matwork on this DVD whatsoever. Also, and this is not mentioned in the description, it is around a 30-minute main workout, with a bonus workout (great music) of about 7 minutes.I like the instructor, but wish she'd put all the chitchat about the gadgets on separate chapters and NOT anywhere in the workouts.
summary: You don't need the Core Bar....
Title: N/A

reviewText: i wa not sure how much of this i could do after just getting back into high gear with my post pregnancy workouts, but i find this bar workout to be very very good. the toning moves are intense, i did not use weights at first, then added 1 and 2 lb dumbbells, but i really want to get leisa harts core bar, she sells it at her site leisahart.com, i wish amazon had it, but oh well, it looks very good and you can take it apart pretty easily. these toning moves are not complex, she does modifications between the bar and free wieghts, and it goes at a pace that is apparently easy to increase, although right now i am getting more than i bargained for. this is a great tape, and so is the chisel video....although this tape is a fat burning BURN tape, you still get pretty good muscle toning, i loved it....i actually have some mini terminator biceps starting to form, the flab is starting to melt away finally.
summary: wow, this is a good toning bar video

reviewText: I absolutely loved this workout. I know some people may wonder how you could love working out, but I do love it. I love the feeling you get afterwards and the energy my body gets. Leisa Hart is the best nstructor, PERIOD! She is the best! FTC Burn was great, the strenght training combined with the upbeat aerobic dance was awesome, my muscles felt it and wer great. I think anyone could do this, you can use Leisa's Core Bar or a body bar or free weights. I preordered her Core Bar, it looks fantastic and easy to change. I loved this routine and recommend it, oh, and I loved the On The Ball Abs video Leisa just released, these are great videos for anyone to do.
summary: totally burned my muscles, GREAT workout
